CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.ACBUDGET (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDEPT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSECT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCJOB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCACTYPE char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCYEAR char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNTOTAL decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCACCHART char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCWARNING char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNPCT01 decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMT01 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNPCT02 decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMT02 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNPCT03 decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMT03 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNPCT04 decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMT04 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNPCT05 decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMT05 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNPCT06 decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMT06 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNPCT07 decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMT07 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNPCT08 decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMT08 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNPCT09 decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMT09 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNPCT10 decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMT10 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNPCT11 decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMT11 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNPCT12 decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMT12 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPROJ char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSUBBR char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNRESERVE decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCISCENTER char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FCBUDGRP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBOICARD char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBOIGROUP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__ACBUDGET__8771A64607C87078 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE  UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMACBUDGETCOYRBRAC ON dbo.ACBUDGET (  FCCORP ASC  , FCYEAR ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCACCHART ASC  , FCSECT ASC  , FCJOB ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMACCHARTCOCODE ON dbo.ACCHART (  FCCORPCHAR ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCSECT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	CONSTRAINT PK__AGL__8771A646CED54455 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMAGLCOACDTBR ON dbo.AGL (  FCCORP ASC  , FCACCHART ASC  , FDDATE ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMAGLCOBRAC ON dbo.AGL (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCACCHART ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMASSETACCDEPRAC ON dbo.ASSET (  FCACCDEPRA ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMASSETACCHART ON dbo.ASSET (  FCACCHART ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.ASSETDPR;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.ASSETDPR (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCMCALDEPR char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCASSET char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCQCASSET char(16) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCYR char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCMTH char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNDEPRAMT decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FCSECT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCJOB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBOICARD char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTSRCUPD datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCSRCUPD char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__ASSETDPR__8771A64612788428 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMASSETDPRASSETYRMTH ON dbo.ASSETDPR (  FCASSET ASC  , FCYR ASC  , FCMTH ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMBANKCODE ON dbo.BANK (  FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMBANKACCTCOBRCODE ON dbo.BANKACCT (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.BILPAY (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCMTYPE char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCMASTERH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPAYMENT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCOFMASTER char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNAMT decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCSEQ char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCMASTAB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTSRCUPD datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCSRCUPD char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__BILPAY__8771A646D50F82B6 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMBILPAYCOBRHSEQ ON dbo.BILPAY (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCMTYPE ASC  , FCMASTERH ASC  , FCSEQ ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMBILPAYPAYREF ON dbo.BILPAY (  FCPAYMENT ASC  , FCMTYPE ASC  , FCMASTERH ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCMTYPE char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCMASTERH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.BOOK (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBAKYRHIS char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREFTYPE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCODE char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME2 char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSTARTCOD char(7) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCGMODHEAD char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCACCBOOK char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCGLHEADRE char(150) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCTYPELINK char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNNITEM decimal(15,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCHEADSTR1 char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCHEADSTR2 char(40) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCHEADSTR3 char(40) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCFOOTSTR1 char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCFOOTSTR2 char(40) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCFOOTSTR3 char(40) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLOCATION char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCVATTYPE char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNVATRATE decimal(15,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCVATISOUT char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FCSECT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCJOB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCATSTEP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCTRLINV char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCTRLTXID char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__BOOK__8771A64651FDC946 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMBOOKCOBRTYCODE ON dbo.BOOK (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCREFTYPE ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;


-- FormulaDB.dbo.BOOKAPV definition

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.BOOKAPV;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.BOOKAPV (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMBRANCHCORPCODE ON dbo.BRANCH (  FCCORP ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,

	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

-- FormulaDB.dbo.COORBAL definition

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.COORBAL;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.COORBAL (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCOORTYPE char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCOOR char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNAMT decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__COORBAL__8771A6462E6A5FD8 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMCOORBALCOBRTYCR ON dbo.COORBAL (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCCOORTYPE ASC  , FCCOOR ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;


-- FormulaDB.dbo.COORFIFO definition

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.COORFIFO;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.COORFIFO (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCOORTYPE char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCOOR char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNAMT decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__COORFIFO__8771A646453B0F26 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMCOORFIFOCOBRTYCR ON dbo.COORFIFO (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCCOORTYPE ASC  , FCCOOR ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;


-- FormulaDB.dbo.COORPGRP definition

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.COORPGRP;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.COORPGRP (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBAKYRHIS char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCOORTYPE char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCODE char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCFCHR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME char(50) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME2 char(50) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCRESOCODE char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCTABNAME char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCTABSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEMPL char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREFTAB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREFSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__CORESO__8771A64661126328 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMCORESOCODEMPLTBID ON dbo.CORESO (  FCRESOCODE ASC  , FCEMPL ASC  , FCTABSKID ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMCORESOEMPLTAB ON dbo.CORESO (  FCEMPL ASC  , FCTABNAME ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMCORESOREEMTS ON dbo.CORESO (  FCRESOCODE ASC  , FCEMPL ASC  , FCTABSKID ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMCORPCODE ON dbo.CORP (  FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.COURSE (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBAKYRHIS char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

-- FormulaDB.dbo.CPS definition

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.CPS;

	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMCRGRPCOTYCODE ON dbo.CRGRP (  FCCORP ASC  , FCCOORTYPE ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMCRZONECOTYCODE ON dbo.CRZONE (  FCCORP ASC  , FCCOORTYPE ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FTSRCUPD datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCSRCUPD char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__CURRENCY__8771A646BA5B51A8 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMCURRENCYCODE ON dbo.CURRENCY (  FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	CONSTRAINT PK__DEFAWH__8771A6464F52C041 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMDEFAWHPROD ON dbo.DEFAWH (  FCPROD ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	CONSTRAINT PK__DEPT__8771A646F03701DF PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMDEPTCORPCODE ON dbo.DEPT (  FCCORP ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPLANT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCOOR char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FDDATE datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCSRCDOCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSRCDOCI char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDELIH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDELII char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNQTY decimal(20,6) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNUMQTY decimal(20,6) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCSRCUPD char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__DXCHAIN__8771A646C7F6B244 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMDXCHAINCDCBRSQ ON dbo.DXCHAIN (  FCCHAINDB ASC  , FCCHAINCP ASC  , FCCHAINBR ASC  , FCRUNNING ASC  , FCCHAINSEQ ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMDXCHAINDCBRBC ON dbo.DXCHAIN (  FCDXCORP ASC  , FCDXBRANCH ASC  , FCDXREFTYP ASC  , FCDXQCBOOK ASC  , FCDXCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMEMPLCOBRCODE ON dbo.EMPL (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMEMPLCOBRFNAME ON dbo.EMPL (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCFCHR ASC  , FCNAME ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMEMPLCOTYCODE ON dbo.EMPL (  FCCORP ASC  , FCTYPE ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMEMPLCOTYEZCODE ON dbo.EMPL (  FCCORP ASC  , FCTYPE ASC  , FCEMZONE ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMEMPLCOTYEZFNAME ON dbo.EMPL (  FCCORP ASC  , FCTYPE ASC  , FCEMZONE ASC  , FCFCHR ASC  , FCNAME ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMEMZONECOTYCODE ON dbo.EMZONE (  FCCORP ASC  , FCEMPLTYPE ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMEMZONECOTYFNAME ON dbo.EMZONE (  FCCORP ASC  , FCEMPLTYPE ASC  , FCFCHR ASC  , FCNAME ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCTABLE char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCMASTERDA char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCODE char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.FORMIFON (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCTYPE char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCODE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME2 char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.GLREFCT;

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMGLREFDTCOBRHD ON dbo.GLREFDT (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCGLREF ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

-- FormulaDB.dbo.GLREFPV definition

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.GLREFPV;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.GLREFPV (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBAKYRHIS char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCGLREF char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEMPLPV char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREMARK char(50) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNCOMMBASE decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCCOMMSTR char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNCOMMAMT decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCSEQ char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FCCHKDT char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTSRCUPD datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCSRCUPD char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,

	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__GLX__8771A646439594DD PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMGLXCOBRHDGL ON dbo.GLX (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCGLHEAD ASC  , FCGL ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMGMODHEADCOTYCODE ON dbo.GMODHEAD (  FCCORPCHAR ASC  , FCTYPE ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPLANT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSECT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FDDATE datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCREMARK char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCGMACHINE char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.ITABLIS2;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.ITABLIS2 (
	FCNAME char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCIDTYPE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FINMILISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCCONNID char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCFCHR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(6) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLIVING char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__ITABLIS2__9B3137B177BF2DD3 PRIMARY KEY (FCCONNID,FCNAME)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMITABLIS2DT ON dbo.ITABLIS2 (  FTDATETIME ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE  UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMITABLIS2NAMESKID ON dbo.ITABLIS2 (  FCNAME ASC  , FCSKID ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMITABLIS2SKID ON dbo.ITABLIS2 (  FCSKID ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCODE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCFCHR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME char(70) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME2 char(70) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMJOBCORPCODE ON dbo.JOB (  FCCORP ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.KEEPFILE;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.KEEPFILE (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCFILETYPE char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMLINKGRPCODE ON dbo.LINKGRP (  FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

-- FormulaDB.dbo.MACHINE definition

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.MACHINE;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.MACHINE (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBAKYRHIS char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREFTYPE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCODE char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPLANT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME2 char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCSTARTCOD char(7) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FDLOCKED datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,

	FCCTRLORD char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCTRLMO char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCWHOUSE char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCTOWHOUSE char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSECT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FNRUNLEN decimal(9,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCDOCRUNFM char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCXFERDEFA char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCACCBOOK char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMMCALDEPRACCHART ON dbo.MCALDEPR (  FCACCHART ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMMCALDEPRCBYMACMAS ON dbo.MCALDEPR (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCYR ASC  , FCMTH ASC  , FCACCHART ASC  , FCMTHDEPRA ASC  , FCACCDEPRA ASC  , FCSECT ASC  , FCJOB ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMMCALDEPRCOBRYMACGH ON dbo.MCALDEPR (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCYR ASC  , FCMTH ASC  , FCACCHART ASC  , FCQCGLHEAD ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMMCALDEPRGLHEAD ON dbo.MCALDEPR (  FCGLHEAD ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCDTYPE2 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU2CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU3STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCDTYPE6 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCDTYPE7 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FNU9CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,

	FCSRCUPD char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__MFORM__8771A6463290DD74 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMMFORMCODE ON dbo.MFORM (  FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.MFORMBR;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.MFORMBR (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCMFORM char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREFTORNG char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUSEINFOR char(60) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREFTOFOR char(60) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMMGLCOACYRMTBR ON dbo.MGL (  FCCORP ASC  , FCACCHART ASC  , FCYR ASC  , FCMTH ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCSECT ASC  , FCDEPT ASC  , FCJOB ASC  , FCPROJ ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCSTEP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDEPT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSECT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCJOB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCORDERH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMORDERI1 ON dbo.ORDERI (  FCORDERH ASC  , FCREFPDTYP ASC  , FCPROD ASC  , FCWHOUSE ASC  , FCUM ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMORDERI2 ON dbo.ORDERI (  FCORDERH ASC  , FCREFPDTYP ASC  , FCFORMULAS ASC  , FCWHOUSE ASC  , FCUM ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMORDERICOBRH ON dbo.ORDERI (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCORDERH ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMPAYMENTCOBRIO ON dbo.PAYMENT (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCINOUT ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMPAYMENTCOBRTYCD ON dbo.PAYMENT (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCPAYTYPE ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMPAYMENTCOIOCODE ON dbo.PAYMENT (  FCCORP ASC  , FCINOUT ASC  , FCCODE ASC  , FCPAYTYPE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMPAYMENTCOTYCDCR ON dbo.PAYMENT (  FCCORP ASC  , FCPAYTYPE ASC  , FCCODE ASC  , FCCOOR ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMPAYMENTGLHEAD ON dbo.PAYMENT (  FCGLHEAD ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,

	FCU7STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE7 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU7CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU8STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE8 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU8CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU9STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE9 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU9CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCACCWR1 char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCGID char(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTSRCUPD datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCSRCUPD char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__PDGRP__8771A646C124038F PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMPDGRPCOTYPDGCD ON dbo.PDGRP (  FCCORP ASC  , FCTYPE ASC  , FCPDGRP ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCQCMEMO char(50) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPROCTYPE char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FNLT_PROC decimal(20,3) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.POST (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCODE char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME char(40) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME2 char(40) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCSTEP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCEDTAPVBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDELAPVBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCISUSED char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLID char(24) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE1 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU1CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU2STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE2 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU2CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU3STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE3 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU3CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU4STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE4 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU4CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU5STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE5 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU5CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU6STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE6 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU6CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU7STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE7 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU7CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU8STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE8 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU8CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU9STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE9 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU9CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCGID char(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTSRCUPD datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCSRCUPD char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__POST__8771A6467C0385AF PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMPOSTCORPCODE ON dbo.POST (  FCCORP ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;


-- FormulaDB.dbo.PPOLICY definition

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.PPOLICY;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.PPOLICY (

	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.PRCVI (
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREFPYTYP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPRCVH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FDDATE datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCOOR char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCHILDGLR char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLAYH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNPAYAMT decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNPAYAMTKE decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNXRATE decimal(20,8) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCSEQ char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNVATAMTKE decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNVATAMT decimal(20,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCREFPAY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNBILLAMT decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNBILLVAMT decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCSTEP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNRETENAMT decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLAYH2 char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTSRCUPD datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCSRCUPD char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__PRCVI__8771A646947C1E4C PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMPRCVICHILAYH2 ON dbo.PRCVI (  FCCHILDGLR ASC  , FCLAYH2 ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCMTYPE char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCMASTERH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPAYMENT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCOFMASTER char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNAMT decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCSEQ char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTSRCUPD datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCSRCUPD char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__PRCVPAY__8771A6465F28D4CC PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);


-- FormulaDB.dbo.PRICE definition

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.PRICE;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.PRICE (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBAKYRHIS char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSYSTEM char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPDGRP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCFORMULAS char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPROD char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCWHOUSE char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSECT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLOT char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCRGRP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCOOR char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEMPL char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPCONTRAC char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPRICENO char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSEQ char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNAMT decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNNET decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNDISCAMT decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNDISCPCN decimal(16,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,

	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.PRODMRP (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPROD char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNALCVAL1 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNALCVAL2 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNALCVAL3 decimal(20,4) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATETY char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEAFTERR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLID char(24) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCGID char(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE1 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU1CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU2STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE2 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU2CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU3STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE3 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU3CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU4STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE4 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU4CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU5STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE5 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU5CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU6STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE6 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU6CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU7STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCDTYPE1 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU1CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU2STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE2 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU2CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU3STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE3 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU3CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU4STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE4 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU4CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU5STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE5 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU5CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU6STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE6 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCU7STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE7 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU7CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU8STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE8 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU8CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU9STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE9 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU9CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__PTRUST__8771A6463163CFBB PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMSOBJPOST ON dbo.PTRUST (  FCSYSOBJ ASC  , FCPOST ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

-- FormulaDB.dbo.RDALLOW definition

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.RDALLOW;

	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREFTYPE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FDDATE datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCACTION char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREMAIN char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCTABNAME char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCTABSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMREFPAYCHILDGLREF ON dbo.REFPAY (  FCCHILDGLR ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMREFPAYCOBRHSEQ ON dbo.REFPAY (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCGLREF ASC  , FCSEQ ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMREFPAYCOBRPRCVI ON dbo.REFPAY (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCPRCVI ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMREFPAYGLHDGLREF ON dbo.REFPAY (  FCGLHEAD ASC  , FCGLREF ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMREFPAYGLRCHGLR ON dbo.REFPAY (  FCGLREF ASC  , FCCHILDGLR ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMREFPAYPRCVI ON dbo.REFPAY (  FCPRCVI ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMREFPAYTYCHGLRGLR ON dbo.REFPAY (  FCREFPYTYP ASC  , FCCHILDGLR ASC  , FCGLREF ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMREFPDX1GLREF ON dbo.REFPDX1 (  FCGLREF ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCSRCUPD char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,

	FCDATASERF char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCFM4TYPE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCOORTYPE char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNFACTOR decimal(12,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCFORNGL char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBACCBOOK char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEDITPROC char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCANCPROC char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDELPROC char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSELTAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTDATETIME datetime DEFAULT getdate() NOT NULL,
	FIMILLISEC int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCFCHR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLINKGRP char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSYSMOD char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNIC decimal(11,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNDEBT decimal(11,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNLEDGER decimal(11,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FTLASTUPD datetime DEFAULT getdate() NULL,
	FTLASTEDIT datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCCREATEAP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU1ACC char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCMANFLAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCADDAPVBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEDTAPVBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDELAPVBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCISUSED char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLID char(24) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCDTYPE2 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU2CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU3STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__REFTYPE__8771A646CFB1AD4B PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMREFTYPECODE ON dbo.REFTYPE (  FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.REPCFG (
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREPCODE char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCFONTNAME char(32) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCFONTSTYL char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNSWIDTH decimal(18,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNSHEIGH decimal(18,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNGWIDTH decimal(18,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNGHEIGH decimal(18,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,

-- DROP TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.SALADJRF;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.SALADJRF (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBAKYRHIS char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCTYPE char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREFSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSALADJTY char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSALADJ char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSALADJO char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNAMT decimal(20,6) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAMTO decimal(20,6) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCREMARK char(100) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREMARKO char(20) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPYPERIOD char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCPYPERIOO char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMSECTCODPCODE ON dbo.SECT (  FCCORP ASC  , FCDEPT ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.SHIFT (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBAKYRHIS char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSTATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FDINACTIVE datetime NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSECT char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCODE char(5) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCFCHR char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME char(70) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCNAME2 char(70) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEMFIXINC char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCTYEMINC char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCEMFIXDED char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCTYEMDED char(10) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNBFOTMIN decimal(9,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNBFOTMAX decimal(9,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCBFSALADJ char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNOTBREAK decimal(9,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAFOTMIN decimal(9,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FNAFOTMAX decimal(9,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCAFSALADJ char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREGBEG1 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREGEND1 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCREGBEG2 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMSTOCKCOBRWHPDLT ON dbo.STOCK (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCWHOUSE ASC  , FCPROD ASC  , FCLOT ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMTRANSDT1CBTYBNSK ON dbo.TRANSDT1 (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCREFTYPE ASC  , FCBOOK ASC  , FCTABNAME ASC  , FCTABSKID ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FNU2CNT decimal(12,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,

	FCDATAIMP char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCMANFLAG char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCEDTAPVBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDELAPVBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU3STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE3 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU3CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU4STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE4 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU4CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU5STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE5 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU5CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU6STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE6 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU6CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU7STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCU8STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__UM__8771A6462DA91827 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMUMCORPCODE ON dbo.UM (  FCCORP ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMUMSTCOCODE ON dbo.UM (  FCSTAT ASC  , FCCORP ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCCREATEBY char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORRECTB char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCU3STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE3 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCU4STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE4 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU4CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,

	FCDTYPE5 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU5CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU6STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE6 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU6CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU7STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE7 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU7CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU8STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE8 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU8CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,

	FCDTYPE9 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__VATTYPE__8771A646F0DF85CD PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMVATTYPECODE ON dbo.VATTYPE (  FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	CONSTRAINT PK__WBOOK__8771A64670117E34 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMWBOOKCOBRTYCODE ON dbo.WBOOK (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCREFTYPE ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	FCDTYPE8 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU8CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCU9STATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCDTYPE9 char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FNU9CNT decimal(4,0) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
	FCSTATUS char(1) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCGID char(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FTSRCUPD datetime DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCSRCUPD char(30) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FMEXTRATAG text COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT NULL NULL,
	FCORGCODE varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCCUACC varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	FCAPPNAME varchar(128) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT PK__WHOUSE__8771A6465B511183 PRIMARY KEY (FCSKID)
);
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMWHOUSECOBRCODE ON dbo.WHOUSE (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

CREATE TABLE FormulaDB.dbo.WORKHOUR (
	FCDATASER char(4) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCSKID char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUDATE char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCUTIME char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCLUPDAPP char(2) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBAKYRHIS char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCCORP char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,
	FCBRANCH char(8) COLLATE Thai_BIN DEFAULT ' ' NOT NULL,

 CREATE  UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMXFERRHCOBRTYBKCD ON dbo.XFERRH (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCREFTYPE ASC  , FCBOOK ASC  , FCCODE ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMXFERRICOBRH ON dbo.XFERRI (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCXFERRH ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX FMXFERRICOBRHSEQ ON dbo.XFERRI (  FCCORP ASC  , FCBRANCH ASC  , FCXFERRH ASC  , FCSEQ ASC  )  
	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;

	 WITH (  PAD_INDEX = OFF ,FILLFACTOR = 100  ,SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF , IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF , STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF , ONLINE = OFF , ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON , ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON  )
	 ON [PRIMARY ] ;
